description: What will Trump say during Thursday press conference?

markets.description:
Donald Trump is scheduled to conduct a press conference in Bedminster, New Jersey, on Thursday, August 15, 2024, at 4:30PM ET.  

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "lisp",  during his press conference currently scheduled for August 15. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No". If the press conference is permanently canceled or delayed beyond August 22, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "lisp",is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to a speech impediment.

The resolution source will be the live video/audio stream of the press conference.
markets.question: Will Trump say "Lisp" at his press conference?
